p: The percentage yield value of the crude extract was 5.75% and that of chloroform, ethyl acetate, and aqueous fractions were 10.83%, 15%, and 74.17%, respectively. The phytochemical screening test revealed the presence of polyphenols, alkaloids, flavonoids, tannins, glycosides, and steroids in the crude extract and all fractions. On the other hand, the crude extract and all fractions were devoid of terpenoids, and saponins were absent in the chloroform fraction ( Table 1).
